summary:
An established writer, social media manager and B2C  brand specialist who has gained valuable experience both agency and in-house. Filled with bundles of creativity combined with organisational skills, a solid work ethic and a record for elevating and growing social media profiles with engaging content. 
ᅳ
Skills and services I provide include: 

Content management/ creation  - photography & video 
Creative writing - blogs; website copy; social media captions
Influencer management & strategy 
Brand management/ strategy 
Social media management 
Social media strategy
Social media analytics/reporting 
Community management  
Paid social optimisation management (creative asset & copy focus) 
Adobe Creative Suite (Lightroom, Photoshop, Rush) 
Canva

profile_positions.title: Global Social Media and Community Manager

profile_positions.description:
Sirdar is a heritage craft brand offering value yarns & patterns to keen knitters & crocheters. Sirdar launched their ecommerce site at the end of 2020, & I was initially contracted as a freelancer to bolster their social media presence to direct consumers whilst being sensitive to retailers (the brand sold previously B2B). 

Key achievements: 
Growing Instagram by 285% since Jan 2021. 
Starting the affiliate programme - increased sales by 5% since launch in June. 
Updating & modernising the brand image with a ‘social first’ approach to photography & video - this has been through our in-house shoots plus influencer strategy. 
Managed two Crochet Alongs from initial conversations to implementation - counted for over 30% of sales for each year. 
Created a Make Along Facebook group that has grown to over 11K members in just over 1 year. 
Video management and launch of over 40 ‘how-to’ videos. 

Key responsibilities include: 
Managing all social media platforms for the brand: Instagram, TikTok, YouTube & Facebook. 
Community management across all social platforms. 
Content calendar creation & management. 
Influencer & affiliate management. 
Creative direction for upcoming shoots. 
Managing our user-generated content through Pixlee. 
Working alongside our graphic designer to create on-brand social content.
Working alongside our agency to implement effective paid social ads. 
Staying up to date with trends for both Reels & TikTok.
Video production - long form & reels/tiktok style. Pre & post production. 
Reporting monthly & yearly on social media performance & how we can improve.
profile_positions.title: Social Media and Content Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working on a freelance contract, I run the social media profiles for heritage crafting brand, Sirdar. 

Key responsibilities include: 
Managing the content calendars (writing, editing and publishing engaging content) across Facebook, Instagram and YouTube. 
Managing the Influencer campaigns and outreach. 
Community Management and Building. 
Social Media Launch strategy for new collections of patterns and yarns. 
Weekly and monthly reporting.
Assisting with Content Creation and Management. 

Since starting earlier this year, I have helped the team grow their Instagram from 18K - 27.3K (Jan - April 2021 results) and their Facebook from 16K - 21K (Jan -April 2021 results). This has been achieved through a solid Influencer strategy, increasing the use of User-Generated Content and taking a fresh approach to content for key launches, ensuring 'social first' content is captured at photo shoots for new collections.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working on a Freelance basis with Relevance to support the team with their organic social media clients, spanning luxury real estate to interiors and fashion. 

Key responsibilities include: 
- Content sourcing 
- Management of content calendars 
- Overseeing the community building 
- Social Strategy/ Consultancy  
- Social Media Reporting 
- Social Media Ad copy
profile_positions.title: Social Media Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Managing the client social media accounts for Relevance, and working alongside Head of Digital and Sales teams to pull together new business proposals. 

Relevance works exclusively with the luxury sector, ranging from luxury travel to supercar brands. I currently have 10 clients, managing their social profiles from day to day organic posting, social media strategies, community management, paid social media (management and strategy) and reporting. I also assist with content creation when needed.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working alongside Head Of Brand, I manage the social media channels for Wool And The Gang. 

Key responsibilities include:
Managing the content calendars (writing, editing and publishing engaging content) across Facebook, Instagram and YouTube. 
Managing the Influencer campaigns and outreach. 
Community Management and Building. 
Weekly and monthly reporting.
Assisting with Content Creation and Management where necessary. 
Copy writing for product descriptions, email campaigns and social copy.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
An established writer and social media manager with over five years in
the industry. I provide businesses with bundles of creativity combined with organisational
skills, a solid work ethic and a record for elevating social media profiles
with engaging content, as well as writing copy for a variety of clients. 
ᅳ
Skills and services I provide include: 

Social Media Management
Social feed plan 
Social Media strategy planning/implementation
Social Media analytics/reporting
Community management
Content Management/ creation (photography, copy)
Creative writing | blogs; website copy; articles; social media captions; press
releases
Influencer marketing/outreach 
Branding guidance 
-

During my time at Wool and the Gang, I helped grow the Instagram by 33K followers and
began a campaign called ‘Stitch of the week’ that continues to provide the highest
engaged posts each month.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Social Media Manager/Strategist and Content creator

profile_positions.description:
Working for the DMC Group, I manage the social media for DMC Embroidery, Wool and the Gang and I'm currently pulling the strategy together for heritage knitting brand, Sirdar. 
Key responsibilities include:
•Managing the content calendars (writing, editing and publishing engaging content) across Facebook and Instagram for DMC, Wool and the Gang (WATG) and Sirdar (to be launched). 
•Pinterest: strategy and management across WATG and DMC. 
•Content planning and creation alongside wider team for all brands. 
•Weekly and monthly reporting for all brands. 
•Defining realistic metrics to benchmark growth and report progress across the business to key stakeholders
•Social growth and engagement strategy across all brands. 
•Create, alongside the creative team, a full suite of creative assets including GIF’s, images, captions and Instagram stories for all brands. 
•Community management across all teams. 
•Copy writing: captions and blogs. 
•Working closely with the e-commerce team to increase sales through social media. 
•Researching new approaches to our strategy and reviewing their value. 
•Working closely with the influencer team to pick valuable influencers and ensure we get the most impact from our social media influencer campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
Contracted work for De'Longhi Group to assist with the following: 
•Implementing and crafting the social media strategy across the De’longhi Group (Kenwood, De’longhi and Braun), training and managing the local markets globally. 
•Developing and administrating social media listening, analytics and monitoring across the group.  
•Supporting the local markets and agencies across all aspects of social media from content creation to blogger outreach. 
•Acting as the social media expert, supporting the brands and local markets across relevant social platforms (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube and Pinterest). 
• Assisting the GTM team with creating content suitable for Social from images, videos, cinemagraphs and blogs. I also work as an in-house photographer and producer for social media content where needed. 
•Video: ideation, shoot plans, script writing and over-seeing post-production work flow
•Photography: ideation, shooting the content & post shoot editing (Photoshop)   
•Preparing and implementing social guidelines and templates to help the local markets operate more effectively. 
•Managing the global YouTube and Pinterest pages across the group. 
•Ensuring consistent implementation of brand guidelines are being fulfilled by the local markets by auditing social channels regularly. 
•Project managing our DAM system for social from initial ideas to implementation 
•Continually working to create new ways of ensuring quality content is being pushed out globally by our local markets. 
• Assisting with the UK Instagram to build a best practice profile for other local markets to use as inspiration.
profile_positions.title: Group Social Media Executive, Global

profile_positions.description:
Over 4 months (September to January) I have been travelling. I started the adventure in South East Asia visiting Thailand, Cambodia and Vietnam moving onto Indonesia, Australia, New Zealand, Fiji and finally, Hong Kong.

It has been an incredible experience and has opened my eyes to a vast variety of cultures; all of which are amazing in their own way. I planned the trip through research and knowing my budget. 

During my trip, I have been blogging and growing my Instagram following. Articles can be found here: www.ladygreek.com and my Instagram following has increased by 25% since September.
profile_positions.title: Travelling

profile_positions.description:
•Worked on over 10 accounts (B2B & B2C) from residential/ commercial property, housing associations, insurance sector and charities. Their strategies are multifaceted & work across social media, digital, press & events using a joined up marketing & PR approach. This works to activate audiences around identified points in client’s customer’s buying cycle.
•Actively worked on social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and LinkedIn) to reach out to key influencers & promote brand awareness/campaigns for clients using social media tools such as Buzzsumo, Social Sprout.  
•Community management was a key part of my role, monitoring clients social platforms daily & responding to any queries as per the brands tone of voice. 
•Researched for innovative ideas, emerging trends, influencers, key hashtags & events to increase social performance. 
•Prepared 1 to 2 week social content calendars 
•Oversaw all media relations on the accounts – writing, issuing & following up press releases. Invited key media to client events & regularly secured trade, regional & national coverage. 
•Social included: strategy, writing, publishing content.
•Video: ideation, shoot plans, script writing and over-seeing post production work flow.
•Digital writing: writing landing pages & blog posts for a variety of clients. 
•Assisted on new business opportunities ensuring key research is done for pitches & attended brainstorming sessions to create innovative, multi-channel ideas with the team. 
•Proactively read key media titles for thought leadership opportunities & stayed up to date with sector trends.  
•Organised client’s events & community engagement opportunities.
•Completed weekly/ monthly PR & social media reports for all clients.
•Proactively planned activity for the month & assisted in creating & implementing strategic content campaigns . 
•I have experience in paid-social media & in media buying for clients.
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
BECG (previously Remarkable Group) is a marketing communications agency offering creative design, video production, PR, marketing and content strategy. As part of the  Content team I worked on over 10 accounts (B2B & B2C) from residential/ commercial property, housing associations, charities. 

- I oversaw all media relations on the accounts – writing, issuing and following up press releases. Invited key media to client events and regularly secured trade, regional and national coverage for our clients.
- I used social media platforms to reach out to key influencers and to promote brand awareness. I used social media tools such as Buzzsumo, Sprout and Moz to do so.
-I created media lists appropriate for our clients – using Gorkana to do so. 
-I kept on top of forward feature opportunities and ensured we pitched for appropriate features in trade magazines to gain beneficial coverage for our clients.
-I monitored the media coverage and recorded the PR value for monthly reporting. I also used Google Analytics to monitor the success of social campaigns. 
-I worked on the internal marketing, writing blogs and updating our social media channels. 
-I worked with our designers and video team to project manage new content e.g. infograhics, videos & marketing collateral.  
-I assisted on new business opportunities ensuring key research was done for our pitch and I attended brainstorming sessions to create innovative ideas with the team. 
-Proactively read key media titles to find thought leadership opportunities and stay up to date with sector trends.  
-I organised client’s events and community engagement opportunities – such as linking up with local schools for competitions or incentive weeks.  
-I kept account leads up to date with my progress; I also updated clients with our progress where appropriate.
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description: During the internship I updated social media platforms, wrote press releases and blog posts. I attended meetings and completed admin tasks.My work during this internship resulted in a secure role at Remarkable Group.
profile_positions.title: PR Intern
